transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Sir, good morning sir, I couldn't give you time that day, sir.
Customer: Yeah, no problem sir, no problem. Do you have time today so that I can connect you to video call and correct it?
Executive: So sir, I am on the way sir, should I call you after reaching factory?
Customer: How much time will it take, tell me.
Customer: So that I will call you if you forget.
Executive: Okay, 11:30.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir, okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to connect via video call to correct something.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer after reaching the factory.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer at 11:30.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to Slightly Positive



@@@Key Topics:

video call, timing, factory
